description: This table is the primary table for hospital encounter information. A hospital encounter is a contact in the patient record created through an ADT workflow such as preadmission, admission, ED Arrival, discharge, and hospital outpatient visit (HOV) contacts. These contact types have the ADT flag (I EPT 10101) set to 1. This table excludes all other contacts.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: ADT_PAT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the patient classification for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADT_PATIENT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the patient status for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Preadmission


Admission


Discharged


Leave of Absence


Hospital Outpatient Visit

columns.name: LEVEL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the level of care for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PENDING_DISCH_TIME
columns.description: The date and time of the pending discharge for this patient contact.

columns.name: DISCH_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the discharge code for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADT_ATHCRT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the authorization/certification status for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Incomplete


Complete


Not Needed

columns.name: PREADM_UNDO_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the preadmission undo reason for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EXP_ADMISSION_TIME
columns.description: The date and time of the expected admission for this patient contact.

columns.name: EXP_LEN_OF_STAY
columns.description: The expected length of stay in days of the admission for this patient contact.

columns.name: EXP_DISCHARGE_DATE
columns.description: The date of expected discharge of the admission for this patient contact.

columns.name: ADMIT_CATEGORY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the admission category for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADMIT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the admission source for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TYPE_OF_ROOM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the type of room requested for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TYPE_OF_BED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the type of bed requested for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RSN_FOR_BED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the reason for the type of bed requested for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DELIVERY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the delivery type of the child for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Vaginal, Spontaneous


C-Section, Low Transverse


Vertical C-Section


C-Section, Unspecified


Vaginal, Vacuum (Extractor)


Vaginal, Forceps


Vaginal, Breech


Non-Spontaneous Vaginal Delivery


VBAC, Spontaneous


C-Section, Low Vertical


C-Section, Classical


Biochemical

columns.name: LABOR_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the labor status for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Expected


Assessment


Admitted


Delivered


Newborn


Discharged


Reserved


Undo

columns.name: ER_INJURY
columns.description: Free text description of injury for this patient contact.

columns.name: ADT_ARRIVAL_TIME
columns.description: The date and time of arrival for this patient contact.

columns.name: ADT_ARRIVAL_STS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the arrival status for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Expected


Waiting


Roomed


Admitted to ED


Transferred


Departed

columns.name: HOSP_ADMSN_TIME
columns.description: The date and time that the patient was first admitted to the facility, bedded in the ED, or confirmed for an HOV for this contact, regardless of patient's base patient class.

columns.name: ADMIT_CONF_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the (admission) confirmation status for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Confirmed


Pending


Canceled


Completed

columns.name: HOSP_DISCH_TIME
columns.description: The hospital discharge date and time for this patient contact.

columns.name: HOSP_ADMSN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the admission type for the patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ROOM_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the room for the most recent location of the patient for this patient contact.

columns.name: HOSP_SERV_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the hospital service for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEANS_OF_DEPART_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the means of departure of the patient for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DISCH_DISP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the discharge disposition for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DISCH_DEST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the discharge destination for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TRANSFER_FROM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the transfer from location for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MEANS_OF_ARRV_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the means of arrival of the patient for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACUITY_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the acuity level for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HOSPIST_NEEDED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a hospitalist needs to be assigned to the patient for this contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ACCOMMODATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the room accommodation for this patient contact.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TYPE_OF_ROOM_C_NAME

columns.name: ACCOM_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the reason for the room accommodation for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Inpatient Data Store record.

columns.name: PVT_HSP_ENC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to private encounter setting for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ED_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Inpatient episode record for the ED visit.

columns.name: ED_DISPOSITION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The disposition of the patient when discharged from the ED.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ED_DISP_TIME
columns.description: The date and time that the disposition was entered.

columns.name: FOLLOWUP_PROV_ID
columns.description: The follow-up provider for the patient.

columns.name: PROV_CONT_INFO
columns.description: The contact information for the patient's follow-up provider.

columns.name: OSHPD_ADMSN_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Office of Statewide Health Planning and Development (OSHPD) Source of Admission


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: OSHPD_LICENSURE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Office of Statewide Health Planning and Development (OSHPD) Licensure of Site


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: OSHPD_ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Office of Statewide Health Planning and Development (OSHPD) Route of Admission


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INP_ADM_DATE
columns.description: Date-time of the inpatient admission. This is the date/time during the hospital encounter when the patient first received a base patient class of inpatient. This can be different than the value for the admission date if the patient was assigned an emergency or outpatient base patient class.

columns.name: COPY_TO_PCP_YN
columns.description:
This item will indicate whether the PCP effective for the patient should be notified upon a pre-determined system event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HOSPIST_NEEDED_YN

columns.name: ADOPTION_CASE_YN
columns.description:
Item to store whether the current contact is related to an adoption case.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HOSPIST_NEEDED_YN

columns.name: PREOP_TEACHING_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item describes whether a patient has been offered or given any pre-operative teaching. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PREOP_PRN_EVAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is a category item that describes whether a patient has been offered or given a pre-operative nurse practitioner evaluation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PREOP_PH_SCREEN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is a category list that describes whether a patient has been offered or given a pre-operative phone screening.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: LABOR_ACT_BIRTH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the actual birth status of the delivery.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Live Born


Stillborn

columns.name: LABOR_FEED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the infant feeding type during the delivery process


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Breast


Bottle

columns.name: PROC_SERV_C_NAME
columns.description:
Procedure Based Service Category


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ED_DEPARTURE_TIME
columns.description: Date and time the patient left the ED.

columns.name: TRIAGE_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and the time the patient was triaged.

columns.name: TRIAGE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The triage status.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: INP_ADM_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The event record for the hospital encounter where the patient first received a base patient class of inpatient, making them an inpatient.

columns.name: INP_ADM_EVENT_DATE
columns.description: Instant of the event creation of the event which caused a patient to become an inpatient patient class.

columns.name: INP_DWNGRD_EVNT_ID
columns.description: Column to return the event ID of the event that last downgrades the patient from an inpatient patient class to a non-inpatient patient class.

columns.name: INP_DWNGRD_DATE
columns.description: Column that returns the effective date and time of a patients latest downgrade from an inpatient patient class.

columns.name: INP_DWNGRD_EVNT_DT
columns.description: Column to return the event date and time of the last event that downgrades a patient from an inpatient patient class to a non-inpatient patient class.

columns.name: OP_ADM_DATE
columns.description: The date and time during the hospital encounter when the patient first received a base patient class of outpatient.

columns.name: EMER_ADM_DATE
columns.description: The date and time during the hospital encounter when the patient first received a base patient class of emergency.

columns.name: OP_ADM_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The event record for the hospital encounter where the patient first received a base patient class of outpatient.

columns.name: EMER_ADM_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The event record for the hospital encounter where the patient first received a base patient class of emergency.

columns.name: PREREG_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Preregistration source value.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: HOV_CONF_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores a flag to prevent HOVs from being closed by the end of day batch.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In Progress


Ready For Completion

columns.name: RELIG_NEEDS_VISIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Used to track a patient's visit-specific religious needs.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: DISCHARGE_CAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
General Category Item for Discharges


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: EXP_DISCHARGE_TIME
columns.description: The time of expected discharge of the admission for this patient contact.

columns.name: BILL_ATTEND_PROV_ID
columns.description: Billing Attending Provider - The attending provider that is or will be specified on the hospital account and claim when billed.

columns.name: OB_LD_LABORING_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient was in labor upon arrival at the hospital.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OB_LD_LABOR_TM
columns.description: The date and time at which labor began.

columns.name: TRIAGE_ID_TAG
columns.description: The trauma identifier assigned to patient. This number is frequently associated with a pre-printed trauma packet that is used when an accident or other incident results in many patients arriving at the hospital in a short time period.

columns.name: TRIAGE_ID_TAG_CMT
columns.description: A free-text comment that can be entered along with the trauma identifier or triage ID assigned to the patient.

columns.name: TPLNT_BILL_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the Transplant Billing Status for a visit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ACTL_DELIVRY_METH_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the delivery method of the last baby delivered on this encounter by this patient. For example, Spontaneous Vaginal Delivery, C-Section - Unspecified, etc.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DELIVERY_TYPE_C_NAME

columns.name: PRENATAL_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Item used to indicate what type of prenatal care the patient has received.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: AMBULANCE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the ambulance code.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MSE_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date and time of the patient's medical screening exam (MSE).

columns.name: ADMIT_PROV_TEXT
columns.description: The free text admitting provider for the encounter.

columns.name: ATTEND_PROV_TEXT
columns.description: The free text attending provider for the encounter.

columns.name: PROV_PRIM_TEXT
columns.description: The free text primary care provider for the encounter

columns.name: PROV_PRIM_TEXT_PHON
columns.description: The free text phone number for the primary care provider.

columns.name: HOSPITAL_AREA_ID
columns.description: This field identifies the hospital area associated with the hospital unit in this patient contact.

columns.name: CHIEF_COMPLAINT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This holds the category number for the chief complaint if the free text chief complaint item is not being used.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
